mapper.select: /* Generated SQL SQL ID : ti_dd_pal_blck.select */ SELECT curr_fat_judg_cd /* curr_fat_judg_cd 현재_비만_판정_코드 character varying(20) */ ,prdt_fat_judg_cd /* prdt_fat_judg_cd 예측_비만_판정_코드 character varying(20) */ ,sex_cd /* sex_cd 성별_코드 character varying(20) */ ,age_ycnt /* age_ycnt 나이_년수 numeric */ ,pal_cd /* pal_cd 신체활동수준_코드 character varying(20) */ ,cal_qty_fr /* cal_qty_fr 칼로리_량_FROM numeric */ ,cal_qty_to /* cal_qty_to 칼로리_량_TO numeric */ ,dd_cal_qty /* dd_cal_qty 일일_칼로리_량 numeric */ ,nutr_cd /* nutr_cd 영양소_코드 character varying(20) */ ,nutr_stat_cd /* nutr_stat_cd 영양섭취_상태_코드 character varying(20) */ ,reg_dt /* reg_dt 등록_일자 character(8) */ ,reg_tm /* reg_tm 등록_시각 character(6) */ ,reg_user_id /* reg_user_id 등록_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ ,upt_dt /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,upt_tm /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */ ,upt_user_id /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ FROM ti_dd_pal_blck WHERE 1 = 1 AND curr_fat_judg_cd = #{currFatJudgCd} /* curr_fat_judg_cd 현재_비만_판정_코드 character varying(20) */ AND prdt_fat_judg_cd = #{prdtFatJudgCd} /* prdt_fat_judg_cd 예측_비만_판정_코드 character varying(20) */ AND sex_cd = #{sexCd} /* sex_cd 성별_코드 character varying(20) */ AND age_ycnt = #{ageYcnt} /* age_ycnt 나이_년수 numeric */ AND pal_cd = #{palCd} /* pal_cd 신체활동수준_코드 character varying(20) */ AND cal_qty_fr = #{calQtyFr} /* cal_qty_fr 칼로리_량_FROM numeric */ AND cal_qty_to = #{calQtyTo} /* cal_qty_to 칼로리_량_TO numeric */
mapper.insert:
/* Generated SQL SQL ID : ti_dd_pal_blck.insert */ INSERT INTO ti_dd_pal_blck ( curr_fat_judg_cd /* curr_fat_judg_cd 현재_비만_판정_코드 character varying(20) */ ,prdt_fat_judg_cd /* prdt_fat_judg_cd 예측_비만_판정_코드 character varying(20) */ ,sex_cd /* sex_cd 성별_코드 character varying(20) */ ,age_ycnt /* age_ycnt 나이_년수 numeric */ ,pal_cd /* pal_cd 신체활동수준_코드 character varying(20) */ ,cal_qty_fr /* cal_qty_fr 칼로리_량_FROM numeric */ ,cal_qty_to /* cal_qty_to 칼로리_량_TO numeric */ ,dd_cal_qty /* dd_cal_qty 일일_칼로리_량 numeric */
,nutr_cd /* nutr_cd 영양소_코드 character varying(20) */
,nutr_stat_cd /* nutr_stat_cd 영양섭취_상태_코드 character varying(20) */
,reg_dt /* reg_dt 등록_일자 character(8) */ ,reg_tm /* reg_tm 등록_시각 character(6) */
,reg_user_id /* reg_user_id 등록_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
,upt_dt /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,upt_tm /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */
,upt_user_id /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
) VALUES ( #{currFatJudgCd} /* curr_fat_judg_cd 현재_비만_판정_코드 character varying(20) */ #{prdtFatJudgCd} /* prdt_fat_judg_cd 예측_비만_판정_코드 character varying(20) */ #{sexCd} /* sex_cd 성별_코드 character varying(20) */ #{ageYcnt} /* age_ycnt 나이_년수 numeric */ #{palCd} /* pal_cd 신체활동수준_코드 character varying(20) */ #{calQtyFr} /* cal_qty_fr 칼로리_량_FROM numeric */ #{calQtyTo} /* cal_qty_to 칼로리_량_TO numeric */ ,#{ddCalQty} /* dd_cal_qty 일일_칼로리_량 numeric */
,#{nutrCd} /* nutr_cd 영양소_코드 character varying(20) */
,#{nutrStatCd} /* nutr_stat_cd 영양섭취_상태_코드 character varying(20) */
,to_char(now(), 'YYYYMMDD') /* reg_dt 등록_일자 character(8) */ ,to_char(now(), 'HH24MISS') /* reg_tm 등록_시각 character(6) */
,#{regUserId} /* reg_user_id 등록_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
,to_char(now(), 'YYYYMMDD') /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,to_char(now(), 'HH24MISS') /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */
,#{uptUserId} /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
)
mapper.update:
/* Generated SQL SQL ID : ti_dd_pal_blck.update */ UPDATE ti_dd_pal_blck
,dd_cal_qty = #{ddCalQty} /* dd_cal_qty 일일_칼로리_량 numeric */
,nutr_cd = #{nutrCd} /* nutr_cd 영양소_코드 character varying(20) */
,nutr_stat_cd = #{nutrStatCd} /* nutr_stat_cd 영양섭취_상태_코드 character varying(20) */
,upt_dt = to_char(now(), 'YYYYMMDD') /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,upt_tm = to_char(now(), 'HH24MISS') /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */
,upt_user_id = #{uptUserId} /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
WHERE 1 = 1 AND curr_fat_judg_cd = #{currFatJudgCd} /* curr_fat_judg_cd 현재_비만_판정_코드 character varying(20) */ AND prdt_fat_judg_cd = #{prdtFatJudgCd} /* prdt_fat_judg_cd 예측_비만_판정_코드 character varying(20) */ AND sex_cd = #{sexCd} /* sex_cd 성별_코드 character varying(20) */ AND age_ycnt = #{ageYcnt} /* age_ycnt 나이_년수 numeric */ AND pal_cd = #{palCd} /* pal_cd 신체활동수준_코드 character varying(20) */ AND cal_qty_fr = #{calQtyFr} /* cal_qty_fr 칼로리_량_FROM numeric */ AND cal_qty_to = #{calQtyTo} /* cal_qty_to 칼로리_량_TO numeric */

,upt_user_id /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
) VALUES ( #{currFatJudgCd} /* curr_fat_judg_cd 현재_비만_판정_코드 character varying(20) */ #{prdtFatJudgCd} /* prdt_fat_judg_cd 예측_비만_판정_코드 character varying(20) */ #{sexCd} /* sex_cd 성별_코드 character varying(20) */ #{ageYcnt} /* age_ycnt 나이_년수 numeric */ #{palCd} /* pal_cd 신체활동수준_코드 character varying(20) */ #{calQtyFr} /* cal_qty_fr 칼로리_량_FROM numeric */ #{calQtyTo} /* cal_qty_to 칼로리_량_TO numeric */ ,#{ddCalQty} /* dd_cal_qty 일일_칼로리_량 numeric */
,#{nutrCd} /* nutr_cd 영양소_코드 character varying(20) */
,#{nutrStatCd} /* nutr_stat_cd 영양섭취_상태_코드 character varying(20) */
,to_char(now(), 'YYYYMMDD') /* reg_dt 등록_일자 character(8) */ ,to_char(now(), 'HH24MISS') /* reg_tm 등록_시각 character(6) */
,#{regUserId} /* reg_user_id 등록_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
,to_char(now(), 'YYYYMMDD') /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,to_char(now(), 'HH24MISS') /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */
,#{uptUserId} /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
) ON CONFLICT DO UPDATE
